se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.api

Interface LocalResources


  • public interface LocalResources
    Resource management API for handling locally stored Resources. A lookup path starts with the ResourceBundle definition for the chosen (or default if no Locale is explicitly passed as an argument)
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getLocalized(String key, String defaultValue)
      Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the default Locale and no static Key=Value substitution.
      String getLocalized(String key, String defaultValue, Locale locale)
      Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the provided Locale and no static Key=Value substitution.
      String getLocalized(String key, String defaultValue, Locale locale, String... keyValueTokens)
      Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the provided Locale and static Key=Value token substitution map.
      String getLocalized(String key, String defaultValue, String... keyValueTokens)
      Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the default Locale and the provided key=value substitutions.
      boolean setDefaultLocale(Locale defaultLocale)
      (Re-)assigns the locale used should no Locale be submitted with the lookup call.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalized

        String getLocalized(String key,
                    String defaultValue)
        Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the default Locale and no static Key=Value substitution.
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        Returns:
        The localized String acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • getLocalized

        String getLocalized(String key,
                    String defaultValue,
                    String... keyValueTokens)
        Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the default Locale and the provided key=value substitutions.
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        keyValueTokens - Either null, or a list holding strings on the form key=value where both key and value must be non-empty. The keyValueTokens will be substituted before the result is returned.
        Returns:
        The String acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • getLocalized

        String getLocalized(String key,
                    String defaultValue,
                    Locale locale)
        Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the provided Locale and no static Key=Value substitution.
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        locale - The locale for which the resource should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The localized String acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • getLocalized

        String getLocalized(String key,
                    String defaultValue,
                    Locale locale,
                    String... keyValueTokens)
        Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the provided Locale and static Key=Value token substitution map.
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        locale - The locale for which the resource should be retrieved.
        keyValueTokens - Either null, or a list holding strings on the form key=value where both key and value must be non-empty.
        Returns:
        The localized String acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • setDefaultLocale

        boolean setDefaultLocale(Locale defaultLocale)
        (Re-)assigns the locale used should no Locale be submitted with the lookup call. The defaultLocale is kept as long as the LocalResources instance lives.
        Parameters:
        defaultLocale - The new default locale, used if no Locale is submitted with calls.
        Returns:
        true if the defaultLocale was successfully set, and false otherwise.
